messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I'm at Wetdale Place.
Can you repeat that address?
W-E-T-D-A-L-E Place.
Is this a house or an apartment?
House.
What's your name?
It's [Name].
What's the phone number you're calling from?
I'm calling you from my cell, which is [Number].
Tell me exactly what happened.
Something is going on. There's a man screaming for about 30 minutes on the front porch. He goes in and screams that he's God. I mean, it's like delusional stuff.
Do you know the house number?
No, I don't.
He stood on the porch and started a monologue. This is not typical at all. This is not a kid; this is a grown man.
Do you think he might be under the influence of alcohol or drugs?

I don't think so. I don't know, I could be wrong. It's just scary because he comes out and screams. At one point, I thought he was talking to someone, but he dropped his pants out there, screaming that he's God, and then slams the door.
How long has this been going on?
This has been going on for about half an hour. He goes back out on the porch, and it's a little scary.
Do you know if he uses alcohol or drugs?
I have no idea.
How old is he?
I don't know. Late 30s or 40s, maybe.
Is he white, Black, Hispanic?
He's white.
What's he wearing?
Last time I saw him, he was in a t-shirt and nothing else.
So he was only wearing a t-shirt?

Well, he had something. I haven't actually walked out there. I'm afraid to walk out there. He was in a t-shirt and then he pulled down his pants while screaming, 'I am God.' It's like he's flipped out.
Do you want the police to come by and speak with you after they investigate?
I don't see a reason for that.
Okay, that's fine. The police will be out there as quickly as possible.
I have heard this guy say in the past that he has a gun. Not in a threatening way, but he has mentioned it.
Okay.
We had a neighborhood disturbance once, and he made an offhand comment about having a gun. I'm a bit worried now.
How long ago did he mention the gun?
A few months ago. It was just an offhand comment.
I understand. The police will be out there as quickly as possible. Stay safe inside your home.
Alright, I will. Thank you.
Have a good night.
You too.
